==Useful Info==
'''Spriggan defenders''' are well-trained [[list of spriggans|spriggan]] warriors, wielding heavier weapons than most spriggans would bother with. Although still not terribly durable, they can take a punch and have higher [[ev]]asion than most spriggans. They can be found as part of spriggan bands throughout [[the Depths]] and in various [[vault]]s, and will always be part of [[the Enchantress]]'s band of followers.

==Tips & Tricks==
*High accuracy attacks will help when facing spriggan defenders. Unavoidable spells such as [[Fireball]], [[Freezing Cloud]], and [[Airstrike]] work well.
*They have a higher than normal chance of generating with weapons of [[distortion]] (10%). Be prepared.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.13]], there was a variant spriggan defender known as a '''spriggan enchanter''' which added a variety of [[Hexes]] to their normal combat prowess.
*During the brief period in which the [[Enchanted Forest]] was available in [[trunk]], spriggan defenders could be found there.
